reference.title: \bold
reference.shortdesc: The \bold command changes the font family of the content within its scope, or as a switch to bold face for the content following the switch, until another font switch or the end of the current scope.

stentry.xref: SCOPEThe SCOPE is delimited content that applies to a particular ConTeXt command. SCOPE is delimted by curly brackets ({}) immediately following the command as an argument.

strow.stentry: A meaningful name for retreiving the buffer.

example.title: Minimal Working Example
example.codeblock:
\starttext
This is {\bold bold} and so is \bold{this}. But this is not.
\stoptext
